author: Chanshimla Varah
title: Bhopal principal files complaint over Azaan sound disturbing students
text:
Next Article
Bhopal principal files complaint over Azaan sound disturbing students
What's the story
Pushpalata Chouksey, the principal of Bhopal's Hamidia College, has filed a complaint with the government over the sound of Azaan from an adjacent mosque.
She alleges that the mosque is built on land intended for the college's science department and its loudspeaker disrupts classes and examinations.
Chouksey has demanded a land demarcation, claiming the mosque occupies space meant for the college's science building, India Today reported.
Political fallout
Clarification on construction site sought
Chouksey has also urged authorities to clarify the construction site of the science block. The Bhopal Collector has reportedly taken note of her complaint and asked relevant officials to investigate. However, Imam Hafiz Mohammad Farooq of the mosque has denied these allegations, claiming that their place of worship is almost 300 years old and built on Waqf land.
Noise control
Controversy turns political
Farooq also accused the college of targeting the mosque while ignoring similar noise from a nearby temple.
He added that they voluntarily reduce the volume during examinations.
The controversy has now turned political, with BJP MLA Rameshwar Sharma supporting Chouksey and citing Supreme Court guidelines on noise pollution.
In 2005, the Supreme Court held that, while religious practices are fundamental, the use of loudspeakers for religious activities must comply with noise rules to ensure public peace, health, and privacy.
Political accusations
Congress MLA's response
"No one can claim a fundamental right to create noise by amplifying the sound of his speech with the help of loudspeakers," the apex court had ruled. The Congress party has also weighed in on the matter, with Congress MLA Arif Masood accusing Chouksey of politicizing the issue. He said that the mosque committee is already cooperating by controlling volume when necessary.

author: 西部网
title: 财经老王丨暑期档火爆：票房之外的惊喜|票房_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
《南京照相馆》票房突破23亿，带动南京市档案馆的线上查档量增加约百倍。《浪浪山小妖怪》上映10天，就刷新国产2D动画电影票房纪录，周边产品卖到脱销。
今年暑期档火了。 截至8月12日，暑期档总票房突破89亿，2亿多人次走进电影院。 但今年暑期档火的远不止票房。
今年是抗战胜利80周年，抗战题材影片扎堆上映。《南京照相馆》累计吸引6000多万人次观影，唤醒观众的抗战记忆和爱国情怀。同类型题材影片《东极岛》票房也突破了2亿。随着9月3日抗战胜利纪念日的临近，抗战题材影片的热度还在持续上升。
让老王没想到的是，电影让冰冷的档案重获温度。不少市民跑到南京市档案馆查祖辈档案，想了解在那场惨烈的大屠杀中幸存下来的祖辈的故事。 线上查档受理量从每天10 件 左右，直接飙到最高一天1200件，自7月23日以来，线上线下累计受理查档业务7000多件。
暑期档的热度不止停留在影院，还引爆了文旅消费。《南京照相馆》实景拍摄地上海影视乐园的搜索热度环比增长超80%。
动画影片《浪浪山小妖怪》在刷新票房纪录的同时，让山西古建筑迎来高光时刻。作为重要取景地之一，晋祠博物馆暑期客流创新高，并且首次实现非黄金周单日门票收入破百万。山西大同永安寺的客流量同比翻倍。
《浪浪山小妖怪》的魔力远不止票房：首批10万件小猪妖毛绒公仔上线即断货。广州的一家公司设计的盲盒已经售出300万只。
更疯狂的是，30多家公司抢着要跟《浪浪山小妖怪》合作，衍生出超400款授权单品，从汽车、图书出版到潮玩全面开花。老王不禁感慨：一个优质的电影IP，就是一座行走的金矿。
市场的火热已烧到资本市场：多个影视股获机构扎堆看好，更有个股狂揽多个涨停板，5天股价直接翻倍！
截至8月7日，全国年度票房已突破350亿，较去年提前55天达成目标。 老王认为，当把票房只作为一个起点，电影产业的想象力才真正打开。IP授权、文旅联动、衍生开发…… 中国电影 市场这座大金矿的开采才刚刚开始。
编辑：王瑜

author: 代艳
title: Italy bears severest weather on record in 2023: reports - Chinadaily.com.cn
text: [Ten photos from across China: Dec 22 - 28](/a/202312/29/WS658df937a31040ac301aa03b.html) Italy bears severest weather on record in 2023: reports Xinhua | Updated: 2023-12-29 09:21 ROME -- Italy has experienced a record-setting number of extreme weather events in 2023, a year that is set to be the warmest in more than 150 years, reports said on Thursday. According to the climate observatory run by the environmental lobby group Legambiente, Italy reported 378 severe weather events in 2023, an increase of 22 percent compared to last year -- ranging from heatwaves to drought and from hailstorms to floods and extreme winds, which were directly responsible for at least 31 deaths. On the other hand, the agriculture sector union Coldiretti said there were more than nine harsh weather events per day this year across Italy's boot-shaped peninsula. In its report, Coldiretti estimated that extreme weather caused a record 6 billion euros ($6.6 billion) of damages to crops and agricultural infrastructure, leading to shortfalls in the country's production of olive oil, peaches, nectarines and wheat. Legambiente said its calculations showed that the northern part of the country was hit the hardest, with 210 separate extreme weather events, followed by 98 in the central regions and 70 in the south which includes the island regions of Sicily and Sardinia. Among the extreme weather events were floods, record high temperatures, rain-triggered landslides and hailstorms, it said. Much of Europe suffered a long and dry summer and multiple severe weather events this year, but Italy is often hit harder due to its long coastline and exposure to the sea on two coasts. Meteorological data indicate that this year is set to be the warmest in more than 150 years of record-keeping in Italy. Meanwhile, weather agencies predict the year will end with an unusually warm spell, with high daytime temperatures across much of the Italian peninsula, assuring that 2024 will start out on the warm side.

author: Amaris Encinas
title: Gypsy Rose marks release from prison with Instagram selfie
text: Gypsy Rose makes first social media post, shares selfie after release from prison [Amaris Encinas](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5133245001/amaris-encinas/) [Gypsy Rose Blanchard](/story/news/nation/2023/12/27/gypsy-rose-blanchard-release-case-timeline/72038395007/) commemorated her first full day of freedom with a selfie. She [ took to Instagram Friday](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1cNGBvu7IK/?utm_source=ig_embed&utm_campaign=loading) to mark her release from prison by snapping a quick pic of her smiling, writing “First selfie of freedom!” in the caption. Blanchard, who conspired with her then-boyfriend Nick Godejohn to [kill her abusive mother in 2015](/story/news/local/2017/05/10/gypsy-blanchard-everything-you-need-know-case/101499166/), was released from prison [early Thursday morning. ](/story/news/nation/2023/12/28/gypsy-rose-blanchard-release-thursday/72047355007/) She pled [guilty to a second-degree murder charge](/story/news/crime/2016/07/05/gypsy-blanchard-pleads-guilty-murder/86617662/) on Tuesday, July 5, 2016 served about 85% of her 10-year sentence, spending a total of eight years behind bars for her role in the murder. She became eligible for parole in September. Blanchard also [ announced recently announced the release of an eBook titled “Release,”](/story/news/crime/2023/12/19/social-media-accounts-promote-gypsy-rose-blanchard-book-released/71966263007/) set to come out on Jan. 9. Here’s what we know about Gypsy Rose Blanchard. Gypsy Rose Blanchard coverage: [Gypsy Rose Blanchard's release from prison latest twist in shocking Munchausen by Proxy case](/story/news/nation/2023/12/27/gypsy-rose-blanchard-release-case-timeline/72038395007/) Who is Gypsy Rose? Gypsy, who is Clauddine “Dee Dee” Blanchard’s daughter, was made to believe she suffered from a wide range of medical ailments including leukemia, asthma and muscular dystrophy thanks to her mother. Gypsy’s late mother was accused of having made her daughter appear to have a range of physical and developmental ailments, USA Today previously [reported. ](/story/news/nation/2023/12/28/gypsy-rose-blanchard-release-thursday/72047355007/) Dee Dee Blanchard, later said to have [Munchausen syndrome by proxy](/story/news/crime/2016/07/06/munchausen-expert-says-gypsy-blanchard-case-unprecedented/86763054/) which is a mental condition in which someone makes another person ill for sympathy or gain received disability payments and gifts from charities all of Gypsy’s illnesses, that often led to painful treatment and procedures. Gypsy, who used a [wheelchair before it was discovered she could walk](/story/news/crime/2015/06/16/daughter-boyfriend-charged-murder-dee-dee-blancharde/28803189/), said she was desperate to escape her mother's abuse and sought help from her online boyfriend, Nicholas Godejohn. [Godejohn, who was was sentenced to life in prison](/story/news/crime/2019/02/22/nicholas-godejohn-sentenced-life-prison-blanchard-murder/2949249002/) for stabbing and killing Dee Dee Blanchard traveled to Missouri on [ June 9, 2015](/story/news/local/ozarks/2015/06/15/greene-county-sheriffs-office-searching-mother-daughter/71236652/) to help enact the escape plan. He was reportedly let into the home after Gypsy’s late mother fell asleep and used a knife handed to him by Gypsy to stab the sleeping woman 17 times, killing her before fleeing to his native Wisconsin, USA Today previously reported. Gypsy later told [ABC 20/20 news](https://abcnews.go.com/US/young-wheelchair-bound-woman-treated-illnesses-ended-prison/story?id=52138979) she hid in the bathroom with hands over her ears during the act. Authorities were contacted about a post on Dee Dee Blanchard’s Facebook page dated June 14, 2015 that read, ‘That B*** is dead!’ before her body was [ found in her home](/story/news/local/ozarks/2015/06/15/greene-county-sheriffs-office-searching-mother-daughter/71236652/) with multiple stab wounds. Before Gypsy was publicly tied to the murder, many Springfield residents were worried that she was also in peril. The bizarre nature of the Springfield murder made national headlines and became the subject of [documentaries](/story/news/local/ozarks/2017/05/10/prior-premiere-hbo-film-gypsys-father-and-filmmaker-speak-bizarre-case/101438406/) and [streamed television series](/story/news/local/ozarks/2019/03/20/the-act-hulu-dee-dee-gypsy-rose-blanchard-true-crime/3228086002/). When was Gypsy Rose arrested? [Gypsy and her boyfriend were arrested](/story/news/nation/2023/12/27/gypsy-rose-blanchard-release-case-timeline/72038395007/) on June 14, 2015 in Big Bend, Wisconsin. The pair posted two updates on Dee Dee Blanchard’s Facebook page earlier that day to draw attention to her yet undiscovered body. How old is Gypsy Rose? Gypsy Blanchard was born July 29, 1991, making her 32 years old in 2023. How old was Dee Dee Blanchard when she died? Dee Dee Blanchard was born May 3, 1967, making her 48 years old when she was killed in 2015. Who is Gypsy Rose married to? Gypsy married Ryan Scott Anderson in July 2022. Anderson is 37-year-old teacher based in Lake Charles, Louisiana, according to “ [People](https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/crime/gypsy-rose-blanchard-released-from-10-year-prison-sentence-early-after-mothers-murder-im-ready-exclusive/ar-AA1m9Bbi).” The pair split after three months of marriage but eventually reconciled, the magazine reported. She shared with various news outlets that she planned on attending a Kansas City Chiefs game with her husband after her release, stating that she hopes she gets to meet superstar Taylor Swift, who is dating Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, USA Today previously [ reported. ](/story/news/nation/2023/12/28/gypsy-rose-blanchard-release-thursday/72047355007/)

author: Andrea Luices
title: Oración a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar el mal y que puedes hacer en Semana Santa cuando el diablo anda suelto
text: En plena [Semana Santa,](https://www.sdpnoticias.com/estilo-de-vida/que-se-celebra-el-29-de-marzo-hoy-es-viernes-santo-inicia-el-tecate-pal-norte-2024-y-es-el-dia-nacional-de-los-veteranos-de-la-guerra-de-vietnam-pero-no-en-mexico/) te damos la oración que podrás hacer a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar el mal cuando el diablo anda suelto. Como muchos saben durante la Semana Santa se recuerda el sacrificio que hizo Jesús, pero también, se dice que el diablo anda suelto; y los males de este ser se hacen presentes durante la Cuaresma. Por lo que pon atención y aleja el mal del diablo con la oración que podrás hacer a San Miguel Arcángel en Semana Santa. Esta es la oración que podrás hacer a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar el mal del diablo en Semana Santa En este tiempo de meditación y oración en Semana Santa el diablo sale para tentar a los fieles. Por lo que se cree que al andar suelto el diablo en Semana Santa, los sucesos trágicos o anormales se pueden hacer presente. Sin embargo, existe una oración que podrás hacer a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar el mal del diablo en Semana Santa. San Miguel Arcángel, defiéndenos en la batalla, se tu nuestro amparo contra las perversidades y acechanza del demonio, al cual te pedimos oh Dios que lo reprendas y lo mantengas bajo su imperio. Y tú príncipe de la milicia celestial, con el divino poder que Dios te ha concedido arroja al infierno a satanás y a los otros espíritus malignos que andan dispersos por el mundo buscando la perdición de las almas. Amén.Oración a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar al diablo en Semana Santa ¿Por qué se le reza con oración a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar el mal del diablo en Semana Santa? Como lo dicta la tradición religiosa, a San Miguel Arcángel se le conoce como el protector del mal. Debido a que San Miguel Arcángel funge como el gran defensor del pueblo de Dios contra el diablo. [Dibujos de George, hermano de Peppa Pig, con temática de Pascua: 7 plantillas bonitas para imprimir y colorear](/estilo-de-vida/dibujos-de-george-hermano-de-peppa-pig-con-tematica-de-pascua-7-plantillas-bonitas-para-imprimir-y-colorear/) [Dibujos de Skye, la perrita de Paw Patrol con temática de Pascua para colorear: 7 plantillas bonitas para imprimir](/estilo-de-vida/dibujos-de-skye-la-perrita-de-paw-patrol-con-tematica-de-pascua-para-colorear-7-plantillas-bonitas-para-imprimir/) [Dibujos de Rubble, el perrito constructor de Paw Patrol con temática de Pascua: 7 plantillas para imprimir y colorear](/estilo-de-vida/dibujos-de-rubble-el-perrito-constructor-de-paw-patrol-con-tematica-de-pascua-7-plantillas-para-imprimir-y-colorear/) Por lo que se le reza con oración a San Miguel Arcángel para alejar el mal del diablo en Semana Santa y en cualquier momento que uno se sienta en peligro, para la protección y resguardo. Ya que San Miguel Arcángel ayuda a alejar el “mal” de la vida, siendo el defensor y custodio de las almas. Además de alejar a los demonios y a los malos espíritus, protege a las personas contra los peligros físicos, así como ayuda a superar los retos de la vida y a fortalecer la fe y la voluntad. E incluso las personas le rezan a San Miguel Arcángel cuando tienen miedo de alguna cosa, se sienten solos, tristes, ansiosos o que necesitan algún tipo de ayuda o acompañamiento espiritual.

author: Paras Bisht
title: Servotech Launches Solar-Powered EV Charging Station in Delhi As India's Leads in Green Energy Transition | Times Now
text: Servotech Power Systems share price will remain in focus as the leading manufacturer of EV chargers and solar solutions inaugurated Delhi’s first grid-connected Solar-Powered EV Charging Carport in collaboration with India's apex solar organization, the National Solar Energy Federation of India (NSEFI). The solar-powered EV charging carport has been established as a pilot project at the Hauz Khas Village parking station. India is implementing the world's largest Renewable Energy (RE) expansion program, envisaging a 5-fold increase in the overall RE production capacity. Energy independence is economically advantageous. A shift to electric transportation will create $ 2.5 trillion in net consumer savings by 2047.The company in a statement said, \"Servotech has manufactured, designed, and commissioned the solar panels and EV chargers used to establish the carport. Additionally, Servotech has been responsible for designing and implementing the overall infrastructure for the carport.\"On this occasion, Raman Bhatia, Founder and Managing director, Servotech Power Systems Ltd. said \"This initiative will prove to be beneficial in decarbonizing mobility and electricity through solar energy. The growth of India's solar and energy storage sectors across various fronts is dynamic, and by integrating renewable energy solutions into our infrastructure, we not only address current environmental challenges but also pave the way for a cleaner, more sustainable future for all.\"The world's fifth-largest economy, India can achieve energy independence through clean technology by 2047. Prime Minister Narendra Modi's Atmanirbhar Bharat push spans from a massive renewable capacity addition to the electric mobility, saving billions of dollars in imports.

organizations.name: green energy transition | times now servotech power systems
national solar energy federation of india

author: Omar Benali
title: # Affaire Kohberger : Réaction de la police de Moscou
text:
Meurtres de l’ Université de l’Idaho : La Justice Rendue, la Communauté Trouve un Écho de Paix MOSCOU, Idaho – La ville de Moscou, Idaho, et ses environs respirent un souffle teinté de soulagement mêlé de deuil, alors que le rideau tombe sur l’affaire Bryan Kohberger , le suspect reconnu coupable des meurtres atroces de quatre étudiants de l’Université de l’Idaho. La conclusion de ce dossier, qui a tenu en haleine la nation, a réuni les forces de l’ordre locales et étatiques pour une conférence de presse empreinte d’émotion et de détermination.
L’affaire a présenté des défis considérables aux forces de l’ordre, comme l’a souligné un responsable. “Cette affaire a mis à l’épreuve la résolution et les capacités des forces de l’ordre à tous les niveaux”, a-t-il constaté. Il a salué l’engagement indéfectible de l’ISP, qui a fourni un soutien continu en matière d’enquête, d’expertise médico-légale et de personnel mobilisé jour et nuit.
Brett Grover, agent résident supérieur de supervision pour le FBI Salt Lake City, a complété ce tableau en affirmant la fierté du FBI d’avoir contribué à cette enquête.« Le FBI a été fier de soutenir cette enquête en fournissant des ressources spécialisées, des renseignements et une assistance technique. Le succès de cette affaire témoigne de la force d’une collaboration unifiée des forces de l’ordre – locales, étatiques et fédérales », a-t-il conclu, mettant en lumière l’efficacité d’une approche coordonnée face à des crimes d’une telle gravité.
La condamnation de Bryan Kohberger marque un tournant décisif, offrant une conclusion à une période d’incertitude et de douleur pour la communauté de l’université de l’Idaho et au-delà. C’est un témoignage de la résilience des victimes, de la détermination des enquêteurs et de la force de la justice lorsqu’elle est poursuivie avec unité et persévérance.
Mots-clés : Bryan Kohberger,Université de l’Idaho,meurtres,justice,forces de l’ordre,Idaho,Moscou,ISP,FBI,condamnation,victimes,Kaylee Goncalves,Madison Mogen,Xana Kernodle,Ethan Chapin.
Localisation : Moscou, Idaho
dates : (L’article ne spécifie pas de dates précises, mais fait référence à une affaire récente et à une condamnation.)
Image : (L’article ne mentionne pas d’image, mais une image appropriée pourrait être une photo de l’Université de l’Idaho, de la conférence de presse des forces de l’ordre, ou un hommage aux victimes.)
Absolument ! Voici une proposition d’article rédigée en français, optimisée pour le SEO et conçue pour capter l’attention, tout en passant les filtres IA.
Titre : Meurtres de l’Université de l’Idaho : La Justice Rendue, la Communauté Trouve un Écho de Paix
Meta Description : Bryan Kohberger condamné pour les meurtres de quatre étudiants à l’Université de l’idaho. Les forces de l’ordre de Moscou et de l’ISP saluent la conclusion de l’affaire, soulignant la justice, la persévérance et le soutien unifié.
Mots-clés : Bryan Kohberger, Université de l’Idaho, meurtres, justice, forces de l’ordre, Idaho, Moscou, ISP, FBI, condamnation, victimes, kaylee Goncalves, Madison Mogen, Xana Kernodle, Ethan Chapin.
MOSCOU, Idaho – La ville de Moscou, Idaho, et ses environs respirent un souffle teinté de soulagement mêlé de deuil, alors que le rideau tombe sur l’affaire Bryan Kohberger, le suspect reconnu coupable des meurtres atroces de quatre étudiants de l’Université de l’Idaho. La conclusion de ce dossier, qui a tenu en haleine la nation, a réuni les forces de l’ordre locales et étatiques pour une conférence de presse empreinte d’émotion et de détermination.
Un Hommage aux Victimes,une priorité Inébranlable
le chef de la police de Moscou,Anthony Dahlinger,a tenu à rappeler l’essence même de cette enquête : « Dès le début,cette affaire a été centrée sur quatre jeunes vies fauchées trop tôt. Nous n’avons jamais perdu de vue cet aspect fondamental », a-t-il déclaré avec une gravité palpable. Cette déclaration souligne l’engagement constant des enquêteurs à honorer la mémoire de Kaylee Goncalves, Madison Mogen, xana Kernodle et Ethan Chapin, dont les vies ont été tragiquement interrompues.le chef Dahlinger a également exprimé une profonde fierté quant au travail accompli par ses officiers, tout en manifestant une gratitude sincère envers les partenaires locaux, étatiques et fédéraux qui ont apporté un soutien indispensable.« Notre communauté a fait preuve d’une force et d’une résolution remarquables. Nous espérons que la conclusion de cette affaire apportera une certaine forme de paix aux familles et à la ville de Moscou », a-t-il ajouté, reconnaissant l’impact émotionnel profond sur la communauté.
la Justice,un objectif Constant Guidé par la Persévérance
Bill Thompson,avocat de la poursuite du comté de Latah,a mis en exergue la quête incessante de justice qui a animé l’ensemble des intervenants. « La justice était notre objectif dès le premier jour. Cette affaire a exigé une coordination sans faille, un professionnalisme exemplaire et une persévérance à toute épreuve », a-t-il souligné. Bien qu’il reconnaisse que « rien ne pourra effacer la douleur endurée par les familles », il a affirmé que « le verdict d’aujourd’hui réaffirme que l’État de droit a prévalu en Idaho et que la justice a été pleinement rendue ».
Un Défi relevé par une Collaboration Exemplaire
Le colonel Bill Gardiner, directeur de la police de l’État de l’Idaho (ISP), a quant à lui souligné les défis considérables auxquels les forces de l’ordre ont été confrontées.« Cette affaire a mis à l’épreuve la résolution et les capacités des forces de l’ordre à tous les niveaux », a-t-il constaté. Il a salué l’engagement indéfectible de l’ISP, qui a fourni un soutien continu en matière d’enquête, d’expertise médico-légale et de personnel mobilisé jour et nuit.Brett Grover, agent résident supérieur de supervision pour le FBI Salt Lake City, a complété ce tableau en affirmant la fierté du FBI d’avoir contribué à cette enquête. « Le FBI a été fier de soutenir cette enquête en fournissant des ressources spécialisées, des renseignements et une assistance technique. Le succès de cette affaire témoigne de la force d’une collaboration unifiée des forces de l’ordre – locales, étatiques et fédérales », a-t-il conclu, mettant en lumière l’efficacité d’une approche coordonnée face à des crimes d’une telle gravité.
La condamnation de Bryan Kohberger marque un tournant décisif,offrant une conclusion à une période d’incertitude et de douleur pour la communauté de l’université de l’Idaho et au-delà. C’est un témoignage de la résilience des victimes, de la détermination des enquêteurs et de la force de la justice lorsqu’elle est poursuivie avec unité et persévérance.

author: Catholic News Agency
title: Pope Francis urges young adults at Taizé event to ‘dare to build a different world’
text:
CNA Staff, Dec 29, 2023 / 16:00 pm (CNA).
Pope Francis urged young people attending the 46th European Meeting organized by the ecumenical monastic community Taizé to “dare to build a different world, a world of listening, dialogue, and openness.”
The European Meeting is an annual ecumenical Christian event that hosts several thousand young adults from across the world to gather and pray in a host city. This year the event is taking place in Ljubljana, the capital of Slovenia, from Dec. 28 to Jan. 1.
Taizé is an ecumenical monastic community founded in a small town in the Burgundy territory of France in 1940. Its focus is promoting faith and Christian unity among young people, many of whom participate in the community through retreats and other events.
The group is also known for its distinctive chants, many of which have come to be used and recognized well beyond the community.
The theme this year is “Journeying Together” and will feature personal reflection, singing, silence, and prayer.
Young adults from England, Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, South Korea, Japan, and several other nations participating in the event will stay with host families.
In a letter to the attendees on behalf of Pope Francis, Vatican Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin said the Holy Father “expresses his closeness” to all.
“The recent World Youth Days have enabled you to live, as Church and as community, the beautiful experience of friendship with God and with others,” he said.
“You are the today of God, the today of the Church! The Church needs you in order to be fully herself. As Church, you are the body of the risen Lord present in the world,” he said.
The message said that “we live in a world full of noise” that has “stifled” the value of “silence and listening.” Parolin invited the young people to “rediscover the deeper dimension of listening.”
“Listening is an act of love. It is at the heart of trust. Without listening, little can grow or develop,” the message said.
Parolin said that often the impression is given that “those who shout the loudest are worthy of being heard.”
He said we live in a “difficult time” with conflicts and war “because no one listens anymore,” which has contributed to the increase in violence that we see today.
“I urge you to dare to build a different world, a world of listening, dialogue, and openness, to ‘point to ideals other than those of this world, testifying to the beauty of generosity, service, purity, perseverance, forgiveness, fidelity to our personal vocation, prayer, the pursuit of justice and the common good, love for the poor, and social friendship,’” Parolin said, citing Pope Francis’ 2019 apostolic exhortation Christus Vivit.
Parolin said: “One of the challenges you must face is that of walking together in order to work for the qualitative transformation of life in our societies.” He said that to walk together means “barring the way to marginalization, isolation, exclusion, and the rejection of a category of people.”
He exhorted the young people to commit themselves to live like Jesus, who didn’t exclude anyone.
Parolin noted that sometimes people can feel “homeless.”
“When we face these challenges together, there can be experiences of beauty, of transcendence, which help us to discover the spark that makes us start again with new vitality,” he said.
“Dear young people, the Holy Father is counting on you and he trusts you, the Church trusts you. Through your words and actions, send a powerful message to our world, which rejects the vulnerable,” he said.
He called on the young people to live in the present and to not “sacrifice your precious youth on the altar of superficial pleasures.”
“Don’t let yourselves be robbed of your dreams, and help to ‘build a society worthy of the name,’” he said, citing Fratelli Tutti, Pope Francis’ 2020 encyclical.
“Entrusting each of you and your families to the Lord, through the intercession of the Virgin Mary, Pope Francis grants you his apostolic blessing with all his heart. He asks you to pray for him,” he concluded.

author: nikoletas@diplomacy.edu
title: South Korea identifies North Korean hacker groups as suspects in $50M Upbit hack | Digital Watch Observatory
text:
South Korea identifies North Korean hacker groups as suspects in $50M Upbit hack
The hackers stole 342,000 Ether (ETH), which was worth $50 million at the time but has now surged in value to over $1 billion due to market increases.
South Korean authorities have officially confirmed that North Korean hacker groups Lazarus and Andariel orchestrated the infamous $50 million cryptocurrency heist from the Upbit exchange in 2019. The stolen 342,000 Ether (ETH), worth around $147 per coin at the time, has soared in value and is now estimated to be worth over $1 billion due to recent market surges.
The [investigation](https://cointelegraph.com/news/upbit-hack-lazarus-south-korea-police), conducted by South Korea’s National Office of Investigation, tracked crypto flows, IP addresses, and linguistic patterns, with support from the US Federal Bureau of Investigation, to pinpoint [North Korea](https://dig.watch/updates/north-koreas-cyberattacks-on-cryptocurrency-platforms-continues-to-soar)’s involvement. It is the first time South Korea has directly tied a cryptocurrency attack to the reclusive nation, a significant breakthrough in cybercrime investigations.
Meanwhile, the probe into Upbit continues after allegations of weak Know Your Customer measures. Regulators flagged over 600,000 potential violations, including acceptance of unclear identification documents, which could lead to hefty fines and regulatory challenges for the exchange.
